catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 52
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: landscape featuring a male figure sitting on a cliff edge near a blossoming tree at R overlooking a valley enveloped in fog and clouds; rooftops visible amid white blossoming trees; poem at R on separate paper
title: Fragment from the Illustrated Scrolls of the Tales of Saigyō (Saigyō monogatari emaki)
